name: Space Invaded
description:
What do you do when a Dwarf planet decides he deserves more space in the solar system? 

Join our hero as he journeys into the unknown, uncertain what awaits... will he arrive, or will we just run out of time and never finish the final levels?! There's only one way to find out.

Controls:

A - Green Cannon Left
D - Green Cannon Right
W - Green Cannon Fire
Left Arrow - Orange Cannon Left
Right Arrow - Orange Cannon Right
Up Arrow - Orange Cannon Fire
